controlled by the frontal temporal

lucid dreaming changes the brain in the

increase in gamma waves which represents

when lucid dreaming takes place these
gamma waves are synchronized with other
neurons that work on a frequency of
conscious awareness and executive

actions and decision making numerous
scientists have shown their interest in

post-traumatic stress syndrome and those

someone's sleepless highly influenced by
PTSD this generally manifests in a
recurrent nightmares that focuses on a

with this disorder get to feel so

negatively impact their daily lives
however lucid dreaming therapy can be a

understand that what they are dreaming

understanding how lucid dreaming can be

in your mind of performing a motor

numerous approaches have been tried for

effective of them all it seems was the
use of cognitive techniques these have
to be performed during the day or Y
following asleep Australian researchers
were able to conclude that the winning
combination of such techniques is the
one between reality testing pneumonic
induction lucid dreaming mild and wake
back to bed WBTV
it appeared that the hundred and sixty
nine participants in the study they
carried out reported the most successful
rate of inducing lucid dreaming with
these three techniques the reality
testing method is best exemplified in a
popular movie Inception through this
technique you have to eventually ask
your waking self if you are dreaming or
not and to actually take an action that
helps you figure this out in the movie
we can notice a reference to this method
that has a spinning top
normally this would eventually stop

flow when dreaming if you feel that this
spinning top is not the best option for

holding your nose as you repeatedly
check yourself during the day you are

repeat a mantra took
the same intention such as any time I

to bed method this WBTV action requires
you to set your alarm clock to one or
two hours before your usual waking time
as the alarm range you wake up for a

bed this short time of awakening
increases your cortical activation in
the key parts of your brain that take

is when you slip back into REM rapid eye
movement sleep face where lucid dreaming

might have increased chances of
including lucid dreaming if you press
